languages.text: "Надеюсь, вам пришелся по вкусу мой кровожадный зверинец?" {n}Вы мгновенно узнаете этот ядовитый голос и дерзкую ухмылку скоморошьей маски. Рука, истерзанная кибермастифом при первой встрече, висит безвольной плетью — скоморох даже не удосужился ее перевязать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, вам пришелся по вкусу мой кровожадный зверинец?" {n}Вы мгновенно узнаете этот ядовитый голос и дерзкую ухмылку скоморошьей маски. Рука, истерзанная кибермастифом при первой встрече, висит безвольной плетью — скоморох даже не удосужился ее перевязать.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.text: "I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, вам пришелся по вкусу мой кровожадный зверинец?" {n}Вы мгновенно узнаете этот ядовитый голос и дерзкую ухмылку скоморошьей маски. Рука, истерзанная кибермастифом при первой встрече, висит безвольной плетью — скоморох даже не удосужился ее перевязать.{/n}

"I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}

"I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}

"I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}

languages.text: “这场血腥的表演，不知你是否满意？”{n}小丑面具之下传来了得意洋洋的笑声，你立刻认出了那恶毒的声音。你们第一次见面时，他被生化獒犬咬伤的手臂依然无力地垂着，而他甚至懒得给自己的胳膊打上绷带。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这场血腥的表演，不知你是否满意？”{n}小丑面具之下传来了得意洋洋的笑声，你立刻认出了那恶毒的声音。你们第一次见面时，他被生化獒犬咬伤的手臂依然无力地垂着，而他甚至懒得给自己的胳膊打上绷带。{/n}

languages.text: «Confío en que haya disfrutado de mis feroces fieras». {n}Reconoces al instante la odiosa voz y la sonriente máscara del bufón. El brazo que le mutiló el cibermastín en su primer encuentro aún le cuelga inerte; ni siquiera se ha molestado en vendárselo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Confío en que haya disfrutado de mis feroces fieras». {n}Reconoces al instante la odiosa voz y la sonriente máscara del bufón. El brazo que le mutiló el cibermastín en su primer encuentro aún le cuelga inerte; ni siquiera se ha molestado en vendárselo.{/n}

languages.text: "Umarım kana susamış hayvanlar bahçemi beğenmişsindir." {n}Soytarının maskesinin kindar sesini ve kendini beğenmiş sırıtışını anında tanıyorsun. İlk karşılaşmalarında siber mastifin parçaladığı kolu gevşekçe sarkıyor, bezle sarmaya zahmet etmemiş bile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Umarım kana susamış hayvanlar bahçemi beğenmişsindir." {n}Soytarının maskesinin kindar sesini ve kendini beğenmiş sırıtışını anında tanıyorsun. İlk karşılaşmalarında siber mastifin parçaladığı kolu gevşekçe sarkıyor, bezle sarmaya zahmet etmemiş bile.{/n}

languages.text: 「血に飢えたものたちはお楽しみ頂けましたかな？」{n}あなたはすぐにその意地悪な声と道化の仮面の自信過剰な薄ら笑いに気づく。最初に出会った時にサイバーマスチフによって負傷した腕はダラリと下がっていた。手当すらしていなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「血に飢えたものたちはお楽しみ頂けましたかな？」{n}あなたはすぐにその意地悪な声と道化の仮面の自信過剰な薄ら笑いに気づく。最初に出会った時にサイバーマスチフによって負傷した腕はダラリと下がっていた。手当すらしていなかった。{/n}

languages.text: « J'espère que vous avez apprécié ma ménagerie sanguinaire. » {n}Vous reconnaissez immédiatement la voix amère et le sourire arrogant du bouffon. Le bras à moitié broyé par le cyber-mastiff lors de leur première rencontre pend mollement à ses côtés. Il n'a même pas pris la peine de le bander.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous avez apprécié ma ménagerie sanguinaire. » {n}Vous reconnaissez immédiatement la voix amère et le sourire arrogant du bouffon. Le bras à moitié broyé par le cyber-mastiff lors de leur première rencontre pend mollement à ses côtés. Il n'a même pas pris la peine de le bander.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, meine blutrünstige Menagerie hat Euch gefallen?" {n}Du erkennst die gehässige Stimme und das arrogante Grinsen der Maske des Narren augenblicklich. Der Arm, den der Cyber-Mastiff bei ihrer ersten Begegnung verstümmelt hat, hängt schlaff herab. Er hat sich noch nicht einmal die Mühe gemacht, ihn zu verbinden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you enjoyed my bloodthirsty menagerie?" {n}You instantly recognise the spiteful voice and the cocky smirk of the fool's mask. The arm that was mauled by the cyber-mastiff at their first meeting hangs limply — he has not even bothered to bandage it.{/n}
